products.title: Cotswold, Pebble Grey - Venetian Blind
products.metadescription: Cotswold, pebble grey - venetian blind cotswold pebble grey is the epitome of modern style blended in perfect harmony with a classic look. The finely poised slats sit proudly in your window space whilst the contemporary pebble grey takes pride of place in
products.productdescription: Cotswold pebble grey is the epitome of modern style blended in perfect harmony with a classic look. The finely poised slats sit proudly in your window space whilst the contemporary pebble grey takes pride of place in even the most modern home. Adding smaller features to the living room like a side lamp and coasters in pebble grey is a great way to create a subtle secondary layer to your decor. Keep the main colours to rich creams and lightly coloured woods and you'll see your favourite new colour really come to the fore.

products.title: Cotswold, Monroe Bisque - Venetian Blind
products.metadescription: Cotswold, monroe bisque - venetian blind the creamy hue of cotswold monroe bisque is the perfect backdrop you need to create the relaxing and homely atmosphere you'll never want to leave. With a gentle colour that adorns every finely cut slat you'll be ab
products.productdescription: The creamy hue of cotswold monroe bisque is the perfect backdrop you need to create the relaxing and homely atmosphere you'll never want to leave. With a gentle colour that adorns every finely cut slat you'll be able to put your feet up with the peace of mind that you can rest without being disturbed. We love the idea of pairing monroe bisque with a matching rug on a lightly stained floor or a modern laminate floor. That way you can set the tone for a relaxing evening with gentle natural shades that always allow you to feel at ease.

products.title: Cotswold, Cosmic White - Venetian Blind
products.metadescription: Cotswold, cosmic white - venetian blind the matt, chalky finish of the cotswold in cosmic white is right on trend, and will work amidst a range of decor schemes. A matching wooden pelmet and bottom rail give this blind a streamlined edge, with no obtrusiv
products.productdescription: The matt, chalky finish of the cotswold in cosmic white is right on trend, and will work amidst a range of decor schemes. A matching wooden pelmet and bottom rail give this blind a streamlined edge, with no obtrusive detailing detracting from its effect.Perfect for a shabby chic theme in a light, vintage bedroom, the cosmic white will look stunning against sweet duck egg walls. Include pretty floral patterns in the room, whether in the bedlinen or accenting cushions, and don't be afraid to add a complementary shade of pink for extra depth.

products.title: Cotswold, Silverton Grey - Venetian Blind
products.metadescription: Cotswold, silverton grey - venetian blind cotswold silverton grey brings a refreshingly elegant shade into your home by really bringing your window spaces to life. The finely crafted slats allow you to celebrate the way the light dances with the exquisite
products.productdescription: Cotswold silverton grey brings a refreshingly elegant shade into your home by really bringing your window spaces to life. The finely crafted slats allow you to celebrate the way the light dances with the exquisite finish to create a regal aesthetic that is a joy to behold. Turn the upstairs landing into the epitome of understated style by adding silverton grey to your existing decor. Pair it with a matching lampshade and a canvas print to create a homely feel in one of the harder spaces to decorate in the home.

products.title: Cotswold, Ghost White - Venetian Blind
products.metadescription: Cotswold, ghost white - venetian blind light and unassuming, the cotswold ghost white is a matt painted blind, comprising of thick, sturdy slats, a strong pelmet and headrail, and a matching bottom rail and acorns. And, treated well for protection, you ca
products.productdescription: Light and unassuming, the cotswold ghost white is a matt painted blind, comprising of thick, sturdy slats, a strong pelmet and headrail, and a matching bottom rail and acorns. And, treated well for protection, you can be sure that this blind won't warp or crack in use.For a fresh and inviting look in a country kitchen, couple the ghost white with a lush apple green. Use the green on the walls and match matt white tiles to the blind, then accessorise with the two tones to your heart's content! Go for glossy silver fittings for a contemporary feel.

products.title: Cotswold, Oatmeal - Venetian Blind
products.metadescription: Cotswold, oatmeal - venetian blind in light, country cream, with a trendy, chalk finish, the cotswold's oatmeal is a pretty and neutral choice. The matt paint makes this blind unobtrusive yet inherently attractive, an effect that is only added to by its c
products.productdescription: In light, country cream, with a trendy, chalk finish, the cotswold's oatmeal is a pretty and neutral choice. The matt paint makes this blind unobtrusive yet inherently attractive, an effect that is only added to by its coordinating pieces and parts.Partner the oatmeal with a lush sky blue in a child's bedroom, where the pale tone of the blind will allow cute patterns and fun characters on bedlinen and wall hangings to stand out on their own. Use a matching cream throughout the room to keep the look light and airy.

products.title: Cotswold, Dove Grey - Venetian Blind
products.metadescription: Cotswold, dove grey - venetian blind pretty and subtle, the cotswold in dove grey has satin finish, with the faintest of sheens and a detectable wood grain aesthetic and texture. The paint colour is a pale grey, perfect for either contemporary or vintage
products.productdescription: Pretty and subtle, the cotswold in dove grey has satin finish, with the faintest of sheens and a detectable wood grain aesthetic and texture. The paint colour is a pale grey, perfect for either contemporary or vintage settings.For a sweet and romantic pastel colour palette, group the dove grey with pale pinks and soft lilacs. Choose one for the walls, or paint opposite walls in each, then furnish the room with painted white or matching grey pieces. This could make the ideal scheme for a child's room or nursery!

products.title: Cotswold, Marble Grey - Venetian Blind
products.metadescription: Cotswold, marble grey - venetian blind matt grey, and with matching components, the cotswold in marble grey combines the contemporary with shabby chic, due to its lovely, chalky finish. Sustainable as well as stylish, this blind offers bags of practicalit
products.productdescription: Matt grey, and with matching components, the cotswold in marble grey combines the contemporary with shabby chic, due to its lovely, chalky finish. Sustainable as well as stylish, this blind offers bags of practicality with its heavy duty headrail and thick, durable slats.Construct a feeling of country vintage chic in the dining room by combining the marble grey with a painted white dining table and cute grey and pink accessories. Include distressed wicker hearts and sweetly patterned cushions to finish the look.

products.title: Cotswold, Ebony - Venetian Blind
products.metadescription: Cotswold, ebony - venetian blind cotswold ebony allows you to take modern decor in an exciting new direction with its unique blend of contemporary colour and classic form. With a slight satin finish sitting against a backdrop of natural light you'll gain
products.productdescription: Cotswold ebony allows you to take modern decor in an exciting new direction with its unique blend of contemporary colour and classic form. With a slight satin finish sitting against a backdrop of natural light you'll gain a new appreciation for the finer things in life. Turn the master bedroom into your own little oasis away from it all with a little help from cotswold ebony. By opting for crisp white sheets and a selection of ebony scatter cushions, and a matching rug, you'll be able to transform your room in a single afternoon.

products.title: Cotswold, Smoke Grey - Venetian Blind
products.metadescription: Cotswold, smoke grey - venetian blind with the faint sheen of its satin paint, the cotswold in smoke grey places a pale grey tone on thick wooden slats, which are treated to prevent cracking and warping, ensuring that this blind will stand the test of tim
products.productdescription: With the faint sheen of its satin paint, the cotswold in smoke grey places a pale grey tone on thick wooden slats, which are treated to prevent cracking and warping, ensuring that this blind will stand the test of time. A matching pelmet, rails, and acorns provide a sleek and unobstructed appearance.Fashion a plain bedroom into a trendy, up-to-date designer haven by pitting the smoke grey against sunny primrose yellow walls. Choose light wood furniture to add an extra dimension to the scheme, and accessorise with matching greys and yellows.

products.title: Cotswold, Oyster - Venetian Blind
products.metadescription: Cotswold, oyster - venetian blind bring a subtle sense of class to your home by blending in the cotswold in oyster, a painted, satin-finish venetian blind with a beautiful cream tone. Its luxe colour even stretches to its included accessories, such as the
products.productdescription: Bring a subtle sense of class to your home by blending in the cotswold in oyster, a painted, satin-finish venetian blind with a beautiful cream tone. Its luxe colour even stretches to its included accessories, such as the wooden pelmet and bottom rail.For a bright and summery vibe, all year round, pair the oyster with pretty coral hues, in varying tones. Paint a window wall in the master bedroom a bold and vivacious coral, and accent matching cream bedlinen with coral-toned cushions and throws. Add gold or copper tones as a finishing touch.

products.title: Cotswold, Cosmic White Gloss - Venetian Blind
products.metadescription: Cotswold, cosmic white gloss - venetian blind cosmic indeed, the cotswold's cosmic white gloss is a magically glossy venetian blind, where thick, tilting slats are painted in a deluxe white sheen. All components, including a headrail, bottom rail, and aco
products.productdescription: Cosmic indeed, the cotswold's cosmic white gloss is a magically glossy venetian blind, where thick, tilting slats are painted in a deluxe white sheen. All components, including a headrail, bottom rail, and acorns, are finished to a high standard, and are provided in coordinating tones.Bring a bold, vivacious shade of tropical purple to life by painting a feature wall and placing the cosmic white gloss against it. Plump for light wooden floors and white and wooden furniture, using matching purple for cushions, throws, and ornaments.

products.title: Cotswold, Oatmeal Gloss - Venetian Blind
products.metadescription: Cotswold, oatmeal gloss - venetian blind ideal for crafting a light and airy aesthetic, the pale and contemporary cotswold in oatmeal gloss provides a stylish alternative to a classic wood finish. The cream paint is high gloss which, in combination with t
products.productdescription: Ideal for crafting a light and airy aesthetic, the pale and contemporary cotswold in oatmeal gloss provides a stylish alternative to a classic wood finish. The cream paint is high gloss which, in combination with the blind's coordinating accessories, creates a united and streamlined look.Transform a neutral room into a smart and usable home office space by mixing the oatmeal gloss with sister creams and on-trend coppers. Include geometric shapes and hard angles to achieve a modern, fashionable look and, for a hint of colour, add a dusky pink tone.

products.title: Cotswold Deluxe, Pebble Grey - Venetian Blind
products.metadescription: Cotswold deluxe, pebble grey - venetian blind if you love the look of cotswold pebble grey why not take a closer look at their deluxe option? By offering you something you won't see everyday it allows you to take your decor in a new direction by opening you
products.productdescription: If you love the look of cotswold pebble grey why not take a closer look at their deluxe option? By offering you something you won't see everyday it allows you to take your decor in a new direction by opening your eyes to what is possible when you fuse design and functionality in perfect harmony. Turning the living room into your own little oasis away from it all is about setting the tone when it comes to colours. With dark pebble grey accessories and a lightly coloured laminate floor you'll be able to create a contemporary look that will make you feel at ease the moment you put your key in the door.

products.title: Cotswold Deluxe, Monroe Bisque - Venetian Blind
products.metadescription: Cotswold deluxe, monroe bisque - venetian blind when you want to rest and relax you need a blind that sits gently in the background and doesn't fight for your attention. The gentle colour of cotswold monroe bisque is perfect if you want to create a warm a
products.productdescription: When you want to rest and relax you need a blind that sits gently in the background and doesn't fight for your attention. The gentle colour of cotswold monroe bisque is perfect if you want to create a warm and welcoming atmosphere that flows naturally from your window space. Pairing monroe bisque with a matching rug in front of the fire and some contemporary canvas wall art is the perfect way to make your house a home. With a picture of what you want to achieve already in your mind all you need to do now is make the changes that will make it happen.

products.title: Cotswold Deluxe, Cosmic White - Venetian Blind
products.metadescription: Cotswold deluxe, cosmic white - venetian blind generate an enchanting window display with the cotswold deluxe in cosmic white, hosting polished, authentic basswood. This elegant arrangement of superior louvres, accompanied by quality components, creates a
products.productdescription: Generate an enchanting window display with the cotswold deluxe in cosmic white, hosting polished, authentic basswood. This elegant arrangement of superior louvres, accompanied by quality components, creates a contemporary, venetian blind that is both practical and easy to install. For an attractive and soothing dcor scheme, display the cosmic white in the bathroom, amongst gleaming white tiles and elegant ceramics. Add colour and creativity by forming a relaxed palette of subtle lilac hues, adding plush, lavender bath towels and charming, mauve-inspired wall art.

products.title: Cotswold Deluxe, Ghost White - Venetian Blind
products.metadescription: Cotswold deluxe, ghost white - venetian blind featuring a matt white colouring, wide, sturdy slats, and a heavy duty headrail and pelmet, the cotswold deluxe in ghost white will make a beautiful addition to any home. Coordinating parts, including woven la
products.productdescription: Featuring a matt white colouring, wide, sturdy slats, and a heavy duty headrail and pelmet, the cotswold deluxe in ghost white will make a beautiful addition to any home. Coordinating parts, including woven ladder tapes, finish the look off neatly and with style.Set the ghost white against a country floral wallpaper for a rural look in either a contemporary or period property. Pick your favourite colour or two from the paper and use them to accent the room, in the form of throws, cushions, and ornaments.

products.title: Cotswold Deluxe, Silverton Grey - Venetian Blind
products.metadescription: Cotswold deluxe, silverton grey - venetian blind if you love the luxury look and feel of cotswold silverton grey then why not take a look at their deluxe option complete with exquisite fabric ribbons? With a unique look that you won't find anywhere else you
products.productdescription: If you love the luxury look and feel of cotswold silverton grey then why not take a look at their deluxe option complete with exquisite fabric ribbons? With a unique look that you won't find anywhere else you'll be able to dress your home to impress like never before. We love the look and feel of pairing silverton grey with a mixture of whites, creams, and light greys in the guest bedroom. That way you can create a clean and crisp look that your guests will never want to leave.

products.title: Cotswold Deluxe, Oatmeal - Venetian Blind
products.metadescription: Cotswold deluxe, oatmeal - venetian blind right on trend, the cotswold deluxe in oatmeal has a matt, chalky finish, perfect for any kind of design scheme from shabby chic to country rural to contemporary sleek. In matching cream, high quality components a
products.productdescription: Right on trend, the cotswold deluxe in oatmeal has a matt, chalky finish, perfect for any kind of design scheme from shabby chic to country rural to contemporary sleek. In matching cream, high quality components are provided, including woven ladder tapes that back the wide slats.Settle the oatmeal into a rural setting, surrounding it with organic hues such as sage and terracotta in a kitchen or dining space. Include chalky paints, bare woods, and natural materials, such as hessians, wickers, and wools.

products.title: Cotswold Deluxe, Dove Grey - Venetian Blind
products.metadescription: Cotswold deluxe, dove grey - venetian blind coated in a gently glistening satin paint, the costwold deluxe in dove grey is comprised of thick slats, a heavy duty headrail, and coordinating ladder tapes. The slats are easily adjustable to allow as much lig
products.productdescription: Coated in a gently glistening satin paint, the costwold deluxe in dove grey is comprised of thick slats, a heavy duty headrail, and coordinating ladder tapes. The slats are easily adjustable to allow as much light, privacy, and ventilation as you choose.Partner the dove grey with soft whites in a nursery to produce a soothing, tranquil atmosphere perfect for a small infant. Add gentle prints featuring sweet animal characters and polka dots, including the occasional hint of subtle colour here and there.

products.title: Cotswold Deluxe, Marble Grey - Venetian Blind
products.metadescription: Cotswold deluxe, marble grey - venetian blind in a matt, chalky paint, the cotswold deluxe in marble grey displays a chic light grey tone on wide wooden slats that tilt with ease for versatile light and air control. Coordinating ladder tapes are an effect
products.productdescription: In a matt, chalky paint, the cotswold deluxe in marble grey displays a chic light grey tone on wide wooden slats that tilt with ease for versatile light and air control. Coordinating ladder tapes are an effective feature, providing a matching, coherent look for sleek designer vogue.Match the marble grey with a soft sky blue for a cool and contemporary look and a tranquil ambience in a baby's nursery. Add chalky white for the cot and trim, and include sweet polka dot and contrasting candy stripes for extra character.

products.title: Cotswold Deluxe, Oyster - Venetian Blind
products.metadescription: Cotswold deluxe, oyster - venetian blind in a creamy ivory tone, the cotswold deluxe in oyster parades a subtly sheen paint on wide, sturdy slats with matching components. For flexible light, ventilation, and privacy, simply tilt the slats to your desired
products.productdescription: In a creamy ivory tone, the cotswold deluxe in oyster parades a subtly sheen paint on wide, sturdy slats with matching components. For flexible light, ventilation, and privacy, simply tilt the slats to your desired degree.Invite country sophistication into your home by teaming the oyster with vintage pinks and an accenting sage green in the master bedroom. Include light, naked woods and dreamy florals, dressing the bed linen with plush chenille throws and cushions for an added touch of luxe.

products.title: Cotswold Deluxe, Ebony - Venetian Blind
products.metadescription: Cotswold deluxe, ebony - venetian blind when you love the finer things in life you'll know that they don't come much finer than their deluxe version of cotswold ebony. By adorning your windows with the exquisite finish of their latest addition you'll be able
products.productdescription: When you love the finer things in life you'll know that they don't come much finer than their deluxe version of cotswold ebony. By adorning your windows with the exquisite finish of their latest addition you'll be able to add that touch of timeless class that no home should be without. Transforming the master bedroom with a little help from cotswold ebony is all about not letting this dominant shade overpower things. Keep the walls neutral and the floor light - it's only the accessories that you should coordinate with ebony if you want to strike the right balance.

products.title: Cotswold Deluxe, Smoke Grey - Venetian Blind
products.metadescription: Cotswold deluxe, smoke grey - venetian blind the cotswold deluxe in smoke grey is aptly named, with its high quality slats and matching components, including woven linen ladder ribbons for streamlined appeal. The slats are easily adjusted, allowing you to
products.productdescription: The cotswold deluxe in smoke grey is aptly named, with its high quality slats and matching components, including woven linen ladder ribbons for streamlined appeal. The slats are easily adjusted, allowing you to let in as much or as little light and air as you need.Build a stunningly unusual decor scheme in your home office by setting the smoke grey against a navy blue feature wall. Paint the remaining walls in white or matching pale grey and furnish the room with grey furniture and navy accessories.

products.title: Cotswold Deluxe, Cosmic White Gloss - Venetian Blind
products.metadescription: Cotswold deluxe, cosmic white gloss - venetian blind bring a plush white sheen into your home by choosing the cosmic white gloss, a shiny painted venetian blind from the cotswold deluxe range. This clean, fresh window dressing has all of the high end feat
products.productdescription: Bring a plush white sheen into your home by choosing the cosmic white gloss, a shiny painted venetian blind from the cotswold deluxe range. This clean, fresh window dressing has all of the high end features of a designer blind, including coordinating linen ladder tapes and a top quality finish.For an ultra-modern and incredibly striking look in a dining room, go all white! Furnish the room from top to bottom in white, from walls to flooring to furniture, and the cosmic white gloss will fit right in. Add splashes of colour with the occasional wall painting or plant.

products.title: Cotswold Deluxe, Oatmeal Gloss - Venetian Blind
products.metadescription: Cotswold deluxe, oatmeal gloss - venetian blind the cotswold deluxe in oatmeal gloss displays an array of shiny, painted horizontal slats, which match the accompanying components of rails and ladder tapes. The slats can be tilted to be fully closed for pr
products.productdescription: The cotswold deluxe in oatmeal gloss displays an array of shiny, painted horizontal slats, which match the accompanying components of rails and ladder tapes. The slats can be tilted to be fully closed for privacy and light-blocking or completely open for light and ventilation.Form a classy living area by opting for a traditional chocolate and cream colour palette, placing the oatmeal gloss against a dark brown focal wall and surrounding cream walls. Add polished woods and plush fabrics, such as chenilles and fleeces, using gold as a subtle trim.
